metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42969 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The py library through 1.11.0 for Python allows remote attackers to conducta ReDoS (Regular expression Denial of Service) attack via a Subversionrepository with crafted info data, because the InfoSvnCommand argument ismishandled.

criterions.comment: python-py: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
